name: mafft
description:
MAFFT is a multiple sequence alignment program for unix-like operating
systems. It offers a range of multiple alignment methods, L-INS-i
(accurate; for alignment of <~200 sequences), FFT-NS-2 (fast; for
alignment of <~30,000 sequences), etc.

dependent_to.name: phyluce
dependent_to.description:
phyluce (phy-loo-chee) is a software package that was initially
developed for analyzing data collected from ultraconserved elements in
organismal genomes

dependent_to.name: guidance
dependent_to.description:
Guidance: Accurate detection of unreliable alignment regions accounting
for the uncertainty of multiple parameters.

dependent_to.name: tcoffee
dependent_to.description: T-Coffee is a multiple sequence alignment program.

dependent_to.name: py-haphpipe
dependent_to.description:
HAplotype and PHylodynamics pipeline for viral assembly, population
genetics, and phylodynamics.

dependent_to.name: orthofiller
dependent_to.description:
OrthoFiller: Identifying missing annotations for evolutionarily
conserved genes.

dependent_to.name: prank
dependent_to.description: A powerful multiple sequence alignment browser.
